radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is diffusely increased in echogenicity most consistent with hepatic steatosis. No discrete liver lesions identified. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary ductal dilatation evident with the common bile duct measuring 4 mm. The gallbladder is not distended but contains multiple large gallstones, one of which appears to be located within the neck. No gallbladder wall edema or pericholecystic fluid. Pancreas is obscured by bowel gas. The spleen is not enlarged measuring 12 cm. Limited evaluation of the right kidney demonstrates no hydronephrosis. No ascitic fluid evident.
